Flow.description: Add logic to create Case Note when Approval Status is updated to Approved or Rejected

value.stringValue: [Referral__c].Name &" - "& [Referral__c].RecordType.Name &" request dated "& TEXT(MONTH([Referral__c].Referral_Date__c)) &"/"& TEXT(DAY([Referral__c].Referral_Date__c)) &"/"& TEXT(YEAR([Referral__c].Referral_Date__c)) &" from "& [Referral__c].Referring_Deputy__r.Name &" has been " & TEXT([Referral__c].Approval_Status__c) & " by "& [Referral__c].Sr_Approver__r.FirstName & " " & [Referral__c].Sr_Approver__r.LastName &" on "& TEXT(MONTH([Referral__c].Approval_Date__c)) &"/"& TEXT(DAY([Referral__c].Approval_Date__c)) &"/"& TEXT(YEAR([Referral__c].Approval_Date__c)) &"."

formulas.name: formula_19_myRule_18_A1_0891200890
formulas.expression: {!myVariable_current.Name} &" - "& {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} &" request dated "& TEXT(MONTH({!myVariable_current.Referral_Date__c})) &"/"& TEXT(DAY({!myVariable_current.Referral_Date__c})) &"/"& TEXT(YEAR({!myVariable_current.Referral_Date__c})) &" from "& {!myVariable_current.Referring_Deputy__r.Name} &" has been " & TEXT({!myVariable_current.Approval_Status__c}) & " by "& {!myVariable_current.Sr_Approver__r.FirstName} & " " & {!myVariable_current.Sr_Approver__r.LastName} &" on "& TEXT(MONTH({!myVariable_current.Approval_Date__c})) &"/"& TEXT(DAY({!myVariable_current.Approval_Date__c})) &"/"& TEXT(YEAR({!myVariable_current.Approval_Date__c})) &"."
